lines.gurmukhi: jYsy jl imil bhu brn bnwspqI cMdn sugMD bn cMcl krq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Jal Mili Bahu Baran Banaasapatee , Chandan Sougandh Ban Chanchal Karat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as water produces vegetation of various colours and forms, but the fragrance of Sandalwood makes all other vegetation around it smelling like itself (Just as water brings variety in vegetation, so is the association with gods and goddesses who make o

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Agin Agin Dwq joeI soeI dyKIAiq pwrs prs joiq kMcn Drq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Agani Agani Dhaat Joee Soee Daykheeati , Paaras Paras Joti Kanchan Dharat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a metal shines like fire when placed in it, but in reality it is no different than what it is. But with a touch of philosopher stone, the same metal becomes gold and shines like it.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy Awn dyv syv imtq nhI kutyv siqgur dyv syv BYjl qrq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Aan Dayv Sayv Mitat Nahee Koutayva , Satigur Dayv Sayv Bhaijal Tarat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly the service of other gods and goddesses cannot destroy the dross of ego of many births. But successful service of the reffulgent True Guru sails one across the worldly ocean.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suKPl mhwqm AgwiD boD nyq nyq nyq nmo nmo aucrq hY ]489]
lines.transliteration_english: Gurmukhi Soukhaphal Mahaatam Agaadhi Bodha , Nayt Nayt Nayt Namo Namo Oucharat Hai ?489?

Shabad OS B.translation: Significance and the ecstasy of True Guru blessed Naam Simran is beyond explanation. That is why all supplicate and salute Him saying repeatedly-Not this, Not this and Not even this.  (489)
